pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 2, 3 on hard  $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Taigas, Grove    $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Sweet Berries, Glow Berries $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Sleeps at day. Attack $(l:creatures/animal-chicken)$(thing)Chickens$(), $(l:creatures/animal-rabbit)$(thing)Rabbits$(), $(l:creatures/aquatic_animal-turtle)$(thing)Baby Turtles$() & $(l:creatures/animal-tropical_fish)$(thing)Fish$(). A fox can hold items in its mouth. Breeding two Foxes results in a $(n)tamed$() $(thing)Baby Fox$().
